title: Former SCBA president Mesbahuddin no more
body: Senior Advocate AFM Mesbahuddin, former High Court judge and past president of the Supreme Court Bar Association (SCBA), passed away at his Dhanmondi residence in Dhaka last night. He was 80. Mesbahuddin, a former principal of City Law College in Dhaka, is survived by his wife, a son, two daughters, and a host of admirers. His namaz-e-janaza will be held at 1:45pm today in the Inner Garden of the Supreme Court, before he is laid to rest at Banani graveyard, family sources said. former SCBA president Mesbahuddin, AFM Mesbahuddin, former High Court judge, Supreme Court Bar Association, SCBA, City Law College, obituary, namaz-e-janaza, Banani graveyard
